articles.author: Chalida Ekvitthayavechnukul, David Rising
articles.title: An American man and his son die after suffering stings from a swarm of wasps while ziplining in Laos - AP News
articles.description: An American man and his teenage son have died after they were stung by a swarm of wasps while ziplining in Laos last month. The incident occurred last month near the city of Luang Prabang, a popular tourist site in the Southeast Asian nation that was named a …
articles.content: BANGKOK (AP) An American man and his teenage son died last month after they were swarmed by wasps while ziplining at an adventure camp in Laos and stung many dozens of times, a hospital official said… [+2214 chars]
